title: Why switch from Horarius to Emprez?
content: Dear Horarius users, did you know that you can migrate to Emprez for free?Let's discover together the good reasons to make this change: A more ergonomic and intuitive platformFeatures available on Emprez that don't exist on Horarius (batch additions, easier access to parameter changes, schedules and drafts on one page, internal mailbox ...)Updates and new features developed regularlyOptional modules compatible with Emprez only (chat messaging, HR Performance ...)Are you worried about the time needed to adapt to Emprez?Don't panic! We offer training assistance to ensure that you will quickly become familiar with your new interface & we put at your disposal a knowledge base regularly updated with many tutorials.In addition, please note that most of your data recorded in Horarius can be exported directly into Emprez. A simple manipulation can be done regarding your schedule templates and the availability of your employees.You also use the same access codes to connect.Finally, Emprez works without Java, so the migration to Emprez will avoid you to be impacted by the dysfunction linked to Java updates.Helpful?00Updated: 3 years ago Share :
